summary: Four incompetent British terrorists set out to train for and commit an act of terror.
cast: Riz Ahmed|Arsher Ali|Nigel Lindsay|Kayvan Novak|Adeel Akhtar|Julia Davis|Craig Parkinson|Preeya Kalidas|Wasim Zakir|Mohamad Akil|Karl Seth|Waleed Elgadi|Alex Macqueen|Shameem Ahmad|Jonathan Maitland|Marcus Garvey|Darren Boyd|Kevin Eldon|Adil Mohammed Javed|Benedict Cumberbatch|Toby Longworth|Danny Ashok|Will Adamsdale|Jayson Benovichi Dicken|Mike Friend|Ian Hughes|Tobias James-Samuels|Mark Morrell|Christopher Morris|Reece Noi|Chris Wilson
title: Four Lions
